pages.text: $(bold)Effect:$()$(br)Fires additional arrows when shooting a bow.$(br2)One additional arrow is fired per rank of Trick Shot.$(br2)$(bold)Trained By:$()$(br)Shooting Arrows$(br2)$(bold)Maximum Level:$() 5
